query:
-- First, clear any existing credit packs
DELETE FROM credit_packs;

-- Insert the 4 credit packs with actual Stripe price IDs
INSERT INTO credit_packs (name, display_name, credits, price_usd, stripe_price_id, is_active, sort_order) VALUES 
('starter', 'Starter Pack', 300, 500, 'price_1SnORVGcthikBvdKXjyHkDEx', true, 0),
('standard', 'Standard Pack', 1000, 1200, 'price_1SnOREGcthikBvdKdY08lZ8K', true, 1),
('pro', 'Pro Pack', 3500, 3500, 'price_1SnORFGcthikBvdKIcILvtEl', true, 2),
('power', 'Power Pack', 12000, 9900, 'price_1SnORGGcthikBvdKojYLZ6Gl', true, 3);
